name: 甜花
text: あー……
trans: Aah...

name: 甘奈
text:
甜花ちゃん待って待って！
『いただきます』がまだだよ！
trans: Hold on, Tenka! You have said "Thank you"!

name: 甜花
text:
あ……そうだった……
にへへ……
trans: Oh... That's right... Nihehe...

name: 千雪
text: そんな、気にしなくていいのに
trans: You don't have to be that mindful.

name: 甘奈
text:
ダメダメ、せっかく３人で食べるんだもん
３人で『いただきます』しなきゃ！
trans: No, it's rare for us to eat together. The three of us have to show our appreciation for this opportunity!

name: 甜花
text:
甜花となーちゃんの……
分けっこの合図、だから……
trans: It is the signal... for Tenka and Na-chan to share so...

name: 千雪
text: まぁ……！
trans: Oh!

name: 甘奈
text:
ね？　だからみんなで！
せーの──
trans: You see? So that's why we have to do it! And──

name: 一同
text: いただきます
trans: Thank you for this.

name: 甘奈
text: んー、他に見てないところはー……
trans: Hmm... Is there any other place we haven't seen yet?

name: 甜花
text: な、なーちゃん……
trans: N-Na-chan...

name: 甜花
text:
甜花……かき氷……食べたい……
……暑い……
trans: Tenka... wants to eat... a kakigori... It's so hot...

name: 甘奈
text:
いいね☆
まだ食べてなかったし！
trans: Nice idea! We haven't gotten to eat that!

name: 千雪
text:
かき氷屋さんなら、さっき見かけたはず……
案内できるかもしれないわ
trans: I think I saw a stall selling that earlier. I might be able to lead us back.

name: 甘奈
text:
やったー！
それじゃあ、さっそく行こー☆
trans: Alright! Let's head there!

name: 甜花
text:
わ……すごい……
どれも美味しそう……
trans: Wow... They're amazing... All of them looks delicious...

name: 甘奈
text:
ホントだね！
どれにしよっかな～……
trans: You're right! I wonder which one I'll have.

name: 千雪
text: たくさんあるから迷っちゃうわね……
trans: It does make it hard to choose seeing there's so many of them.

name: 甘奈
text: う～ん……
trans: Hmm...

name: 甘奈
text:
よし、決めたっ
甘奈はイチゴ☆
trans: Okay, I've made up my mind. I'll go with strawberry.

name: 千雪
text: 私は、宇治金時にしようかな
trans: Maybe I'll have an ujikintoki.

name: 千雪
text: 甜花ちゃんはもう決まった？
trans: Have you decided on something, Tenka?

name: 甜花
text:
甜花は……ぶどう……
あ……でも……売り切れてる……
trans: Tenka will get... the grape-flavored one... Ah... but... they're all out of it...

name: 千雪
text:
うーん……何かないかなぁ
他にお店もなさそうだし……
trans: Hmm.. I wonder if there something else. The other stalls doesn't to have one either.

name: 甜花
text: 大丈夫……甜花、違うのでも……
trans: It's alright... Tenka will get something else...

name: 甘奈
text: ねぇねぇ、千雪さん、甜花ちゃん
trans: Chiyuki, Tenka.

name: 甘奈
text:
あっちに、自販機あったから
そこで買ってぶどう味、作っちゃわない？
trans: There's a vending machine over there so maybe we buy the grape flavor there and make one ourselves?

name: 甜花
trans: Eh?

name: 甘奈
text:
ジュースでかき氷作っても、結構美味しいんだって
友達が言ってた☆
trans: My friend told me that using juice to make kakigori turns out to be quite good.

name: 甜花
text:
ふわ……そんなことができるんだ……
なーちゃん、すごい……
trans: Wow... Tenka didn't know you can make it that way... That's amazing, Na-chan...

name: 甘奈
text: えへ、友達のアイデアだけどね☆
trans: Ehe, it was my friend's idea though.

name: 甘奈
text: ちょうどぶどう味のジュースがあって良かったね☆
trans: It's nice that they do have some grape juice here.

name: 甜花
text:
うん……氷だけのかき氷も……
頼んでくれて、ありがと……千雪さん……
trans: Yes... Thank you... Chiyuki... for ordering... the kakigori with just ice...

name: 千雪
text:
ううん、いいのよ
さ、氷が溶けないうちに作っちゃいましょう？
trans: No, it's alright. How about we make it before the ice melts?

name: 甜花
text:
うん……こ、これくらいかな……？
にへへ……
trans: Okay... M-Maybe this much? Nihehe...

name: 甘奈
text:
美味しそうだね！　甜花ちゃん
じゃあ、みんな一緒に食べよう☆
trans: That looks good, Tenka! Okay, let's eat them together.

name: 一同
text: いただきます
trans: Thank you for this.

name: 甘奈
text: うーん！　冷たーい！
trans: Mmm! It's so cold!

name: 甜花
text: ぶどう……美味しい……
trans: The grapes... is delicious...

name: 甜花
text: 千雪さん……これ……
trans: Chiyuki... Here...

name: 千雪
text:
わ、いいの？
甜花ちゃん
trans: Oh, you won't mind, Tenka?

name: 甜花
text:
うん……
千雪さんにも……食べてほしい……
trans: Yes... Tenka also... wants you to have a taste of it...

name: 千雪
text:
ありがとう
……ん、美味しい♪
trans: Thank you. Mmm... It's delicious♪

name: 甘奈
text: あ！　じゃあ、甘奈のもどーぞ☆
trans: Ah! Here, have some of mine too!

name: 千雪
text:
……うん
イチゴ味も美味しいわ
trans: Mmm... The strawberry one is also delicious.

name: 千雪
text:
それじゃあ、
私からもふたりにお返しね
trans: Okay, I'll be returning the favor to you two now.

name: 甘奈
text: ありがと！　千雪さん！
trans: Thanks, Chiyuki!

name: 甘奈
text: ……んー！　美味しー☆
trans: Mmm! It's so good!

name: 千雪
text: はい、甜花ちゃんも
trans: Here, Tenka, have some too.

name: 甜花
text: ありがと……
trans: Thank you...

name: 甜花
text: 少し苦いけど……大人の味……
trans: It's a little bitter but... it does have that adult taste...

name: 千雪
text: うふふ
trans: Ufufu.

name: 千雪
text:
それにしても、ジュースをかけたかき氷なんて
初めてだったけど……美味しくなってよかったわね
trans: This is my first time eating a kakigori using juice but I'm glad that it turned out delicious.

name: 甘奈
text:
えへへ、甘奈もここまでいいカンジになっちゃったから
ちょっとびっくりしてるかな
trans: Ehehe, well, we have a really good mood going so I was kinda caught a little off-guard.

name: 甜花
text:
なーちゃんの、おかげだね……
にへへ、ありがと……
trans: This is all thanks to you, Na-chan... Nihehe... thank you...

name: 千雪
text: これなら、事務所でも簡単に作れるかもね
trans: I guess we could easily make one even at this office this way.

name: 甘奈
text:
事務所でかき氷……！
それ、めっちゃいいかもー☆
trans: Having kakihori at the office! That sounds like a really good idea!

name: 甜花
text:
甜花も……もっと色んな味……
食べたい……
trans: Tenka... wants to eat... other flavors too...

name: 甜花
text:
あ、紅茶……甘いやつ、とか……
美味しいかも……にへへ
trans: Oh, tea... like a sweet one... It might turn out delicious... Nihehe...

name: 甘奈
text: おぉ～！　甜花ちゃんオリジナルだねっ☆
trans: Ooh, a Tenka Original!

name: 甘奈
text: じゃあ甘奈も自分だけの味、作っちゃお☆
trans: In that case, I'll make my own flavor too!

name: 千雪
text:
ふふっ、まずはプロデューサーさんに
かき氷機が欲しいって頼んでみよっか
trans: Fufufu, let's try asking Producer first about a ice shaver machine.

name: 甘奈
text: えへへ、やった☆
trans: Ehehe, alright.
